section.title: We Need Feedback!
section.para: If you find a typographical error in this manual, or if you have thought of a way to make this manual better, we would love to hear from you! Please submit a report in Bugzilla against JBoss Developer Studio: https://bugzilla.redhat.com/enter_bug.cgi?product=JBoss%20Developer%20Studio
When submitting a bug report, be sure to select the manual's name and the poducts version.

If you have a suggestion for improving the documentation, try to be as specific as possible when describing it. If you have found an error, please include the section number and some of the surrounding text so we can find it easily.
